name: absolute
description: Applies position: absolute to the component.

name: bottom
description: Aligns the component towards the bottom.

name: direction
description: Direction in which speed-dial content will show. Possible values are top, bottom, left, right.

name: fixed
description: Applies position: fixed to the component.

name: left
description: Aligns the component towards the left.

name: mode
description: Sets the transition mode (does not apply to transition-group). You can find more information on the Vue documentation for transition modes.

name: origin
description: Sets the transition origin on the element. You can find more information on the MDN documentation for transition origin.

name: right
description: Aligns the component towards the right.

name: top
description: Aligns the content towards the top.

name: transition
description: Sets the component transition. Can be one of the built in transitions or one your own.

name: value
description: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden.
